Key Match Events: Oneil Cruz made a couple of critical gaffes in center field that paved the way for a handful of Royals runs
Mitch Keller yielded four runs, three of them earned, on four hits while striking out six
Others: The Pirates struggled to do much of anything offensively
Rookie Billy Cook, who got off to a hot start by going 2 for 4 in his MLB debut last Sunday, is now 0 for his last 10 with four strikeouts
